select * from yryz_ad T WHERE 1=1
AND ad_title like CONCAT('%',trim(#{adTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND ad_keyword = trim(#{adKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND (start_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} OR end_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
AND (start_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} OR end_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
AND start_time > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND shelve_flag = 0
AND start_time <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND end_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND shelve_flag = 0
AND end_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND shelve_flag = 0
AND shelve_flag = 1
ORDER BY T.sort ASC
